authors.author: Ralph E. Hudson William H. Clark

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name
of the Lord;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name
of the Lord.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
All praise to Him
who reigns above,
In majesty supreme

verse.name: v1b
v2a
verse.lines:
His name above
all names shall stand,
Exalted more and more,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
At God the Father's
own right hand,
Where angel hosts adore.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Redeemer, Savior,
Friend of man,
Once ruined by the fall,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Thou hast devised salvation's plan,
For Thou hast died
for all.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
His name shall be
the Counselor,
The mighty
Prince of Peace,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Of all earth's kingdoms Conqueror,
Whose reign
shall never cease.
